q: If successful, Katie Price would join Louis Walsh , Dannii Minogue and Cheryl Cole on the show and Simon Cowell 's ex-girlfriend and show mentor Sinitta thinks she will be a great choice. Comment on this Article She said: Having Jordan on the panel would make interesting viewing, so I can definitely see it working. She can do anything she puts her mind to. She's got the personality that would fit the role perfectly. Simon Cowell really likes her as well. There's no denying they get along. However, Katie Price - who recently split from second husband Alex Reid - faces competition from Robbie Williams as the Take That star is also being lined up to replace Simon Cowell .

Planned Parenthood must be defunded.'' The Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act, sponsored by Mike Pence ( R-IN), was introduced on January 7, 2011 and would ensure that tax dollars are not sent to abortion providers under Title X family planning grants. proposal intended to incite a panicked response to a phony crisis,'' Bill Lockyer , a Democrat, said during a conference call with reporters organized by the Economic Policy Institute, a Washington, D.C., think tank. Killer bees, space aliens... now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states. The truth is, no state wants to declare bankruptcy, no state needs to declare bankruptcy, and no state would.
